title: Several sermons upon the fifth of St. Matthew .... [vol. 2] being part of Christ's Sermon on the mount / by Anthony Horneck ... ; to which is added, the life of the author, by Richard Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells.
author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publisher: Printed by J.H. for B. Aylmer ...,
notes: Errata: p. 62 at beginning of v. 1.
Volume 1 (Wing H2851) is found at reel 1673:10; v. 2 (Wing H2852) is found at reel 1702:20.
Imprint of v. 2 reads: London: Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., 1698.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
